name: GitHub User Manager
about: Final Project for Tbilisi School of Communication
description: Fetching data from GitHub REST API. App divide into four parts: Dashboard - list of GitHub top users, Details - additional information about users (top repositories/organizations), Search - find users and Favorites - add/remove users.

name: Millionaire App
about: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire TV show app
description: 'Who Wants to Be a Millionaire' TV show app. Choose answers and app shows correct ones. If answer is correct the game continues, otherwise it is finished and earned money is appeared on screen.

name: Trivia API Quiz
about: Fetching data from Open Trivia Database
description: Fetching data from Open Trivia Database. In the beginning there is opportunity to choose number of questions, categories and difficulty levels. At the end correct answers percentage is shown.

name: Star Wars API
about: Fetching data from Star Wars API
description: Fetching info about people, films, starships, vehicles, species and planets from Star Wars API.
